USER_QUERY: how many orders were delivered in 2016
RELEVANT_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) AS delivered_orders_count FROM sales.orders WHERE order_status = 4 AND YEAR(order_date) = 2016

USER_QUERY: orders processed between Jan-15-2016 and Jan-14-2017
RELEVANT_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) AS processed_orders_count FROM sales.orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2016-01-15' AND '2017-01-14'

USER_QUERY: how many employees works for all stores
RELEVANT_SQL: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.staff_id) AS employees_all_stores FROM sales.staffs s JOIN (SELECT store_id FROM sales.stores) all_stores ON s.store_id = all_stores.store_id

USER_QUERY: how much staff works for all stores
RELEVANT_SQL: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT s.staff_id) AS employees_all_stores FROM sales.staffs s JOIN (SELECT store_id FROM sales.stores) all_stores ON s.store_id = all_stores.store_id

USER_QUERY: list all products by categories and brand names
RELEVANT_SQL: SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name, b.brand_name FROM production.products p JOIN production.categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN production.brands b ON p.brand_id = b.brand_id ORDER BY c.category_name, b.brand_name;
